comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
Minis don’t really have collections — there’s achievements which track unlock progression, and there’s drop tables for the mini set consumables. If you’re interested in the former, that’ll probably get exposed.

EDIT: I’m guessing that the old “mini collections” used the drop tables, orz.

comments.body: Would it be possible to add the collection set that the mini belongs to into this API? I have a few users looking to view by collection.
